name: unpromising
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Something that is unpromising does not show any signs that it will be enjoyable or successful: The car broke down, which was an unpromising start to the holiday.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
not producing a desired resultunsuccessfulOur attempts to change the law were unsuccessful.failedThe company went bankrupt pouring money into yet another failed product.badSales have been really bad this quarter.fruitlessAll our pleas that she remain in university were fruitless - she left anyway.unfruitfulThe negotiations were unfruitful.
